pr_title: [report.sh] Another fix for the report script - correct obtaining of original secret

timeline.message:
another fixup for the report script ...

Signed-off-by: Lukas Kral <lukywill16@gmail.com>

replies.bodyText:
nope, that will print the secrets "header" or "label" like we have for all the resources_to_fetch. Without it, that only prints the secrets names, so it looks like this:
secrets
   secret/my-cluster-clients-ca
   secret/my-cluster-clients-ca-cert
   secret/my-cluster-cluster-ca
   secret/my-cluster-cluster-ca-cert
   secret/my-cluster-cluster-operator-certs
   secret/my-cluster-entity-operator-certs
   secret/my-cluster-kafka-brokers
   secret/my-cluster-zookeeper-nodes

without it it's just:
   secret/my-cluster-clients-ca
   secret/my-cluster-clients-ca-cert
   secret/my-cluster-cluster-ca
   secret/my-cluster-cluster-ca-cert
   secret/my-cluster-cluster-operator-certs
   secret/my-cluster-entity-operator-certs
   secret/my-cluster-kafka-brokers
   secret/my-cluster-zookeeper-nodes
replies.author: im-konge
